critique: The executive order seems to be a rather neutral announcement. It grants the Secretary of Agriculture the authority to acquire land for wildlife refuges. There's no obvious attempt to evoke strong emotions. However, one could argue there's a hint of joy associated with the idea of preserving wildlife and creating sanctuaries. There might also be a very mild sense of surprise that such an order is being issued. The other emotions (sadness, anger, fear, disgust) don't seem to be relevant at all.
